pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parametric Survival Functions // Executes parametric survival analysis techniques similar to those in 'Minitab'. Fits right censored data to a given parametric distribution, produces summary statistics of the fitted distribution, and plots parametric survival, hazard, and cumulative hazard plots. Produces Anderson-Darling test statistic and probability plots to assess goodness of fit of right censored data to a distribution.
